dialog: 🌳 It’s true. I am the *Tree of Knotty and Nice*…
🌳 So, my fruit must come in 🍐 *pears*.
👸 Welcome stranger, I am *Princess Dice of Euia*…
👸 The power of *mojick*, the transmutation of *emoji*, has faded from the land…
👸 With it, all the *mojical creatures* have vanished…
👸 The 🦄 *unicorn* has not been seen since *The Fall*…
💂‍♀️ Hark! I’m the *Captain of the Guard*…
💂‍♀️ In the forest to the west, there is a 🌳 *tree* that is quite unlike the others…
💂‍♀️ Soldiers use its 🍐 *fruit* to improve their 💛 *stamina*  when they travel in the *Eural Mountains*.
💂‍♂️ Hark! I’m *a sharp Major* in service to her Majesty 👸 *Princess Dice*…
💂‍♂️ A *friend of mine* has gone missing in the *Eural Mountains*, to the south…
💂‍♂️ Please help them if you can!
👨‍🔧 I came here with my sturdy *pick axe* but I was trapped by this ⛰ *boulder*…
👨‍🔧 There are 🥉 *precious medals* in these mountains. One can make a fortune!
👨‍💼 Greetings, I am *Phil*, a lesser demon of monetary exchange…
👨‍💼 This is a branch of the *Bank of Dysia*…
👨‍💼 While you’re here, we can exchange 🥉 *precious medals*…
👨‍💼 The Bank of Dysia provides all manner of exchanges.
👩‍🏭 This is a *forge* where we do honest *forgery*…
👩‍🏭 Place a medal in the forge to craft a useful component!
💇‍♀️ Did you know that you can sheer 🐑 *sheep* with ✂️ *scissors*?
🧓 It’s hard to stay warm in the ❄️ *frigid north*…
🧓 That’s why I knit myself a 🧥 *jacket*…
🧓 I 🔪 *whittled* my needles out of 🌲 *soft wood*.
🐟 Fish can swim over the *edge of the world*…
🐟 I have seen *you people* make them with 🥄 *shovels*.
🧜‍♀️ My brother, Herman, became an ordinary 🐟 *fish* when they lost the sacred 🔱 *trident*…
🏊‍♂️ A trident is like a ⚜️ *golden fleur* but with the points *twisted* upward…
🏊‍♂️ I bet you would need a 🔨 *hammer* /and/ a 🔧 *wrench* to do intricate jewler’s work like that…
🧜‍♂️ Thank you for restoring our sacred 🔱 *trident*!
🤽‍♂️ I saw one once, *west* of here…
🤽‍♂️ Can you imagine, painting the clover 🥇 *gold*?
🧽 I’m planted, but not a plant…
🧽 I’m inanimate, yet am an animal…
🧽 I come back at the turn of the tide.
🎅 We were once the powerful *Moji* of the north…
🎅 We were the stewards of the *Essence of Wind*…
🤶 We seek a student to pass on our knowledge…
🎅 They must construct for us an *umbrella*…
🐍 I am *Sal the Snake* and this is *Midia*, the center of *Daia*…
🐍 In this world torn between *knotty* and *nice*, I was *toadally newtral*, the *mojus of moji*…
🐍 When *mojick* returns, then will it be possible to restore me to my 🦎 *true form*, for I was once the *Sal the Mander*…
🦎 Thank you for restoring me to my *true form*. I am *Sal Mander*, The *Toadally Newtral*…
🦎 Go forth and restore the *mojick* of *Daia*!
👩‍🚀 Hi, I’m *Astrid*. Welcome to the *Royal Observatory*…
👩‍🚀 I’m an *astronomer*. I look to the 🌌 night sky for clues.
👨‍🌾 Did you know that there’s a special tree that produces 🍃 *bay leaves*?
🧓 Hello, I’m *Justin*. Welcome to the *Clock Tower*…
🧓 At the clock tower, we can craft with *time*…
🧓 For example, crafting with *bread* and *water* here will produce *beer*!
👨‍🔧 Crafting with mushrooms can make some things *grow*…
👨🏻‍🦰 Did you know that the mojical 🍀 *four leaf clover* is lucky?
👨🏻‍🦰 All we have now though are ordinary ☘️ *three leaf clover*.
🐋 I’m the largest mammal ever to have existed…
🐋 I would give it all up to be a *narwhal*…
🐋 Narwhals were the unicorns of the sea.
🐻 I could go all about the frozen north unseen despite my enormity…
👩‍🍳 *Crafting with cake* makes many things shrink!
🏋️‍♂️ Hi, I’m *Jim*. Welcome to the *weighting room*…
🏋️‍♂️ Ring the *dumbells* and one of our dedicated trainers will be right with you… 🤪🔔🛎
👨🏼‍💻 I wish there were a way to make our kitty 🐈 *Sam* bigger.
